__e: They're from the NSA and they're after you.
I don't think you work for the NSA, and there's no bomb on this train.
Well, I figured, NSA and all, you wouldn't want to talk about this over the phone.
You think the NSA has it?
The NSA has good people. Very good.
The NSA is right; it's a lot easier when you don't need a warrant.
